com.adaptiweb.mojo
Class BuildNumberMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      com.adaptiweb.mojo.BuildNumberMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextEnabled, Mojo
public class BuildNumberMojo
extends AbstractMojo

Goal which provide some dynamic information in build time thru project properties.
Right now are supported these four properties:

  1. buildNumberProperty
  2. timestampProperty
  3. revisionNumberProperty
  4. lastCommittedRevisionProperty
